summary:
Vibrant Credit Union’s CTO, Pete Nohelty, Joins Metal Blockchain Advisory Council - Metallicus announces the addition of Pete Nohelty, Chief Technology Officer at Vibrant Credit Union, to the Metal Blockchain advisory council.

 Vibrant Credit Union Joins Metal Blockchain's Banking Innovation Program - Exploring Blockchain Use Cases for Enhanced Financial Services

 Metal Blockchain Introduces it’s Banking Innovation Program - Empowering Banks with Cutting-Edge Digital Identity and BSA Compliance: Metal Blockchain's Banking Innovation Program
